abstract: The bookseller reported a wider-than-expected loss for the quarter, but sales of the Nook –the object of its suitor’s affection — continued to improve.
snippet: The bookseller reported a wider-than-expected loss for the quarter, but sales of the Nook –the object of its suitor’s affection — continued to improve.
lead_paragraph: Andrea Renault/Bloomberg News A customer browsed nonfiction books at a Barnes & Noble in New York in May.

headline.main: Barnes & Noble Keeps Mum on Liberty Bid as Loss Widens

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
